Detailed Description

Header for implementation of state-independent attributes logic for ZCL.

Author:
Microchip Corporation: http://www.microchip.com
Support email: support@microchip.com

Copyright (c) 2018, Microchip Corporation. All rights reserved. Licensed under Mirochip's Limited License Agreement.

Definition in file zclAttributes.h.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct _ZCLActionWriteAttrReq_t ZCLActionWriteAttrReq_t

This structure is used by ZCL_ACTION_WRITE_ATTR_REQUEST action in BC_ZCL_EVENT_ACTION_REQUEST to inform the respective cluster about the write attribuite request

typedef struct _ZCLActionReadAttrReq_t ZCLActionReadAttrReq_t

This structure is used by ZCL_ACTION_READ_ATTR_REQUEST action in BC_ZCL_EVENT_ACTION_REQUEST to inform the respective cluster about the read attribuite request

Function Documentation

ZclCommand_t* zclGetCommandByCluster ( ZCL_Cluster_t *  cluster,
uint8_t  direction,
ZCL_CommandId_t  commandId 
)

Finds command descriptor by cluster, direction and command id.

Parameters:
[in]cluster- pointer to cluster.
[in]direction- command direction (client or server).
[in]commandId- command unique identifier.
Returns:
command descriptor if found, NULL otherwise.
ZclCommand_t* zclGetCommand ( Endpoint_t  endpointId,
ClusterId_t  clusterId,
uint8_t  directionMspMask,
ZCL_CommandId_t  commandId 
)

Finds command descriptor by endpoint id, cluster id and command id.

Parameters:
[in]endpointId- endpoint number.
[in]clusterId- cluster unique identifier.
[in]directionMspMask- command direction (client or server) as well as msp specific cluster.
[in]commandId- command unique identifier.
Returns:
command descriptor if found, NULL otherwise.
ZclAttribute_t* zclGetAttribute ( Endpoint_t  endpointId,
ClusterId_t  clusterId,
uint8_t  clusterSideMspMask,
ZCL_AttributeId_t  attributeId 
)

Finds attribute descriptor by endpoint id, cluster id , cluster side and attribute id.

Parameters:
[in]endpointId- endpoint unique identifier.
[in]clusterId- cluster unique identifier.
[in]clusterSideMspMask- cluster side (client or server) as well as msp specific cluster
[in]attributeId- attribute unique identifier.
Returns:
attribute descriptor if found, NULL otherwise.
ZCL_Status_t zclReadAttributeValueSafe ( Endpoint_t  endpointId,
ClusterId_t  clusterId,
uint8_t  clusterSideMspMask,
ZCL_AttributeId_t  attrId,
uint8_t *  attrType,
uint8_t *  attrValue,
uint16_t  maxSize 
)

Safe version of ZCL_ReadAttributeValue without caller buffer overflow.

Parameters:
[in]endpointId- endpoint of attribute to be read
[in]clusterId- cluster of attribute to be read
[in]clusterSideMspMask- client or server side as well as msp specific cluster
[in]attrId- attribute identifier
[out]attrType- attribute type
[out]attrValue- buffer to read attribute value
[in]maxSize- maximum size of buffer
Returns:
status of operation
ZclAttribute_t* jumpToNextAttribute ( ZclAttribute_t *  attr)

Jumps to the next attribute.

Parameters:
[in]attr- current attribute
Returns:
next attribute
ZclCommand_t* zclGetNextCommand ( ZclCommand_t *  command)

Get Next command.

Parameters:
[in]command- current command
Returns:
next command
ZCL_Cluster_t* zclGetCcluster ( Endpoint_t  endpointId,
ClusterId_t  clusterId,
uint8_t  directionMspMask 
)

Finds cluster by endpoint id and cluster id.

Parameters:
[in]endpointId- endpoint number.
[in]clusterId- cluster unique identifier.
[in]direction- command direction (client or server).
Returns:
cluster descriptor if found, NULL otherwise.
